general_advidory: Prepare for heavy rainfall in the upcoming week. Avoid sowing new crops.

cotton.advisory: Due to the expected heavy rainfall, take necessary steps to prevent waterlogging in cotton fields.

rice.advisory: Ensure proper drainage in rice fields to avoid water stagnation during the rainy season.

wheat.advisory: Prepare for low temperatures during the upcoming weeks to protect wheat crops from frost damage.

tomato.advisory: Keep a lookout for any signs of pests and diseases in tomato plants, especially during periods of high humidity.

potato.advisory: Monitor potato crops closely for any signs of late blight, a common disease that thrives in wet conditions.

corn.advisory: Implement water conservation measures in corn fields to cope with the forecasted dry spell in the region.
